changes.comment: BREAKING: Remove ResolvedDefinition.display/style/layoutStyle fields, remove DisplayRendererProps.display, change createEvaluatedDefinition signature, remove FormStateBaseImpl.allowedOptions, lazy children initialization via ensureChildren(), checkbox inline label rendering. Add schema form types from schemas-editor, withScripts/notExpr helpers, new ControlDefinition fields (noSelection, style, layoutStyle, allowedOptions), controlDefinitionSchema option.
